text: Ba-emaan log to wohi hain jo Allah Taalaa per aur uss kay rasool per yaqeen rakhtay hain aur jab aisay moamlay mein jiss mein logon kay jama honey ki zaroorat hoti hai nabi kay sath hotay hain to jab tak aap say ijazt na len kahin nahi jatay. Jo log aisay moqay per aap say ijazat ley letay hain haqeeqat mein yehi hain jo Allah Taalaa per aur uss kay rasool per eman laa chukay hain.pus jab aisay log aap say apnay kissi kaam kay liye ijazat talab keren to aap inn mein say jissay chahayen ijazat dey den aur inn kay liye Allah Taalaa say baksish ki dua mangen be-shak Allah bakshney wala meharbaan hai
